**Merge strategy**

| Pull request | Merge type |
|:------------:|:----------:|
| **feature** to `develop` | SQUASH MERGE |
| **feature** to `release` | SQUASH MERGE |
| **hotfix** to `main` | SQUASH MERGE |
| **develop** to `release` | MERGE COMMIT |
| **release** to `main` | MERGE COMMIT |
